instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, no image on screen Black screen
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> has backlight and no image
working with an external screen
replaced j9000 
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_LCDVDD_SW_F</SIGNAL> is present

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, no image on screen Black screen
threads.message:
Check L9080 first.
Next, check diode mode on all LVDS DATA lines to ground; w/ and w/o LCD connected.
Also try known good compatible screen.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, no image on screen Black screen
threads.message:
I tried new lcd always no image but some color is floating.

L9080 is fine 3.3v on both sides

Pin
6 .662
7 .664
8 .693
9 .695
11 .696
12 .695
14 .671
15 .644
17 .671
18 .644

??????

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, no image on screen Black screen
threads.message:
Did you try compatible screen for sure?
Can you explain "color floating"?
Compare diode mode readings w/ and w/o screen connected.
You can get some difference, but values should be similar on each pair.
